Health Potion.name: Health Potion
Health Potion._on_field_use_source:
print(character.name+' used '+item['name']+' ! This is POTION Script !')
	if item['charges']>0 :
		item['charges'] -=1
		SfxPlayer.stream = NodeAccess.__Resources().sounds_book[item['sound']]
		SfxPlayer.play()
		character.stats['curHP'] +=10
		# character.stats['curHP'] = max(character.stats['curHP'], character.stats['maxHP'] )
		GameGlobal.refresh_OW_HUD()
		print('Did it taste good ?')
	else :
		print(item['name']+' is empty !')
